stories.title: Nominated for the BBC New Comedy Award
stories.body: For the second year running, Sam has been nominated forthe BBC New Comedy Award! After being whittled down to the top 60 comedians, the heats will now take place across the country. Sam will be performing in Heat 2, which will be broadcast on BBC Radio 4 Xtra at 10.30pm, July 6th.
